actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To provide a special statute of limitations for certain refund claims.

summary.text: Establishes a special statute of limitations for income tax credits or refunds based on overpayments attributable to the taxpayer's failure to take proper credit for amounts withheld by employers or other income payors with respect to tax year 1985, permitting a refund or credit if the claim is filed on or before April 15, 1990.

titles.title: To provide a special statute of limitations for certain refund claims.
